tgt_original: devamānuṣāsuragandharvaiḥ saha vartata iti sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvo lokaḥ |
nanu ca ko'parastadvyatirikto loko'  sti yastaiḥ saha vartata ityucyate |
api ca santyanye'  pi bahavaḥ kinnaramahoragagaruḍādaya ityacodyametat |
ete sarve'pi saddharmaśravaṇānnānyat svahitaṃ parahitaṃ ca gurutaramupalabdhavantaḥ,
